programme.desc: Brother's Keeper - After a man is killed by an explosive package shipped to his home, the team attempts to capture the sender and intercept his latest deadly parcel.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Fathers And Sons - The team rushes to track down two doctors abducted by a desperate father willing to do anything to save his son. Also, Jubal's uncertainty in his family life affects his judgement during the hostage situation.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Short Squeeze - When the CEO of a major brokerage firm is shot and killed while surrounded by protesters, the team looks into who had the most to lose from his company's perceived manipulations.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Trigger Effect - While investigating a mass casualty incident at a New York City restaurant, the team scrambles to determine if it was racially motivated and if there was more than one gunman.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Straight Flush - When five prominent men are gunned down at a trendy New York restaurant, the team's investigation brings them into contact with a lieutenant in Antonio Vargas' cartel, triggering a showdown between Isobel and Vargas.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Never Trust A Stranger - The team welcomes a new member, Special Agent Tiffany Wallace, as they search for killers who orchestrated a mass shooting at a media company, and OA’s personal connection with the case threatens to cloud his judgement.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Unreasonable Doubt - The team races to stop an active serial killer after three women are found weighted down at the bottom of a lake, and Jubal looks into an old closed case after there are multiple similarities to the recent victims.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Liar's Poker - When the leader of a drug cartel and one of the world’s most wanted men, Antonio Vargas , is apprehended by the team, the entire FBI headquarters is put at risk when his henchmen unveil a terroristic threat to free him.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Crazy Love - A shooting at a quinceañera leaves two dead, but the team believes they may not have been the intended targets.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Clean Slate - As the team searches for a young girl who was kidnapped from a cabin during a family vacation, they discover that the abduction may be tied to a skeleton in her family’s closet.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Uncovered - The team must infiltrate a drug trafficking gang after the robbery of a chemical plant leaves two customs agents dead. Also, Nestor (Josh Segarra) offers his help on the case, giving Maggie new insight into his character

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Discord - An experience on the job has new agent Tiffany Wallace examining the tension between her career as an FBI special agent and the responsibility she feels to her community as a black woman.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Walk The line - After a bomb leaves three people dead, the team presses a reluctant informant to gather information from his close friends who are under suspicion.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Leverage - When a political reporter is kidnapped and held without a ransom demand, the team must dig into her past relationships in order to pin down her assailant's motive.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Revealing the inner workings of UPS, delivering to the world Brompton bicycles, Rold locking washing machines, and Nongshim instant noodles.

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Black Holes: Heart of Darkness - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joanna travels the length of India, showing us delights like the flower-sellers of Madurai, before taking us back to Uzbekistan for gory tales and gem making.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - Life on the Wing Ep6
programme.desc: Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Dino Ep7
programme.desc: T-Rex and chickens seem to be as different as they can be, but they more in common that you might think. Recent research reveals that some of our favorite dinosaurs were very birdlike, and that birds are an extant kind of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Untamed West Ep2
programme.desc: New Zealand’s West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the island’s forests.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - Life on the Wing Ep6

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Delta Discoveries Ep3
programme.desc: The Western Arctic’s mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - Return of the African Titans Ep1
programme.desc: There are eight North African white rhinos left in the world and only four are of breeding age. With the clock ticking on their species, an international mission has been working for several years to move the four to Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast Ep5

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Gate of the Mist Ep2
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta sits in the shadow of Mount Kenya – the second highest peak in Africa. It has one of the most beautiful sunrises in all of Africa.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Eclipse of the Pride Lands Ep3
programme.desc: How close do you want to get to a lion? The staff must get close enough to place radio transmitting collars on them to keep track of the lion population.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Wild Fortresses Ep3
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Fall on the Tundra Ep4
programme.desc: Nunavik, meaning “Great Land”, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Devils of Even Tide Ep4
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta has a growing hyena population and staff must take the first-ever census of these very effective nocturnal hunters.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Pendulum of Existence Ep5
programme.desc: Four North African white rhinos are settled at Ol Pejeta. The staff must prepare them for a return, not just to life in a semi-wild environment, but also to try and trigger their wild instincts – particularly their desire to breed.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Addo Elephant Ep1
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the “big seven”: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Table Mountain Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Isimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as “the Miracle”, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts Ep3
programme.desc: A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Born to Be Different Ep1
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - A Friend in Need Ep2
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Rewind: MTV Asks One Direction

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep3
programme.desc: Garage - The Dinotrux builds a garage where the Reptools can be safe, but D-Structs tries to thwart their efforts by pitting them against one another.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Jolly Olde England - Wally and Wenda's plan to watch a soccer game in London is interrupted when Odlulu and Fritz use the Key in the Stone to summon a medieval castle in the middle of modern-day England. It's up to the Wanderers to stop King Fritz before his knights turn London upside down!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Bad Lot-Tentant / Jet Fetters - Lotta takes a personality quiz and learns she's supposed to be evil. Tiny and Lucretia offer to get the girls' costumes for the Horn-A-Corn convention.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Oath Of The Compass / Garbage Fruit - Archibald must think fast after forgetting to mail invites to his sister's party. Archibald uses his other senses when he's temporarily unable to see.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Boo To You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep29
programme.desc: Citizen Brain / Lair Liar Pods On Fire - The Big Brain Boov recruit Oh to join them; Oh is introduced to the concept of "harmless lying," and lies so much that he is unable to distinguish between fact and fiction

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade Of The Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep5
programme.desc: Akila Says No - When Brian and Cleo try to get Akila to say “no”, they find themselves face to face with the galaxy’s grossest outlaws, the scavengers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep29
programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep3
programme.desc: Brothers - When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep3
programme.desc: Sherman'S Pet/ Marco Polo - Sherman begs Peabody to keep a Wolly Mammoth he names Captain Cools as his pet; Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges to discover spaghetti.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep3
programme.desc: Imperfect Harmony - The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade Of The Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep29
programme.desc: Grand Theft Otto - Toby gets secret transmissions through his headgear and his friends decide they need to infiltrate; meanwhile, Jim forms an unlikely alliance

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep3
programme.desc: Imperfect Harmony - The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert & The Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Postcards From The Veg - Pieface laments that Paul is looking peaky and needs a holiday. Dennis has a plan! But its only when Walter kidnaps Paul that he realises his chips are down and he needs to get the gangs help to put things right!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Whole Tooth - Gnasher gnashes Walters portrait so he retaliates with a titanium sausage leaving Gnasher toothless, miserable and without his mojo! Dennis and the gang will have to stage a heist to 'borrow' some diamonds until Gnasher's teeth grow back!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep39
programme.desc: A New Defender - Victory is almost within reach of the Voltron Coalition, but after a setback has the team trapped, their only hope for survival comes in the most unexpected way

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Glide And Gobble / Wheelie, No Hands - Stranded in a canyon, Archibald and his siblings search for a way out. When it comes to bike riding, Archibald has serious skills. Who knew?

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies A Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side Of The Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep29
programme.desc: Citizen Brain / Lair Liar Pods On Fire - The Big Brain Boov recruit Oh to join them; Oh is introduced to the concept of "harmless lying," and lies so much that he is unable to distinguish between fact and fiction

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Where There'S Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep33
programme.desc: Why Ants Work Together - You see there was a time when Ants didn't work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops… “Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!!”… and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep34
programme.desc: Why Flea Jumps - You see there was a time when Flea didn't jump. Flea didn't really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea ‘Movement and activity!' and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep33
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Rainbow - It's Fable Forest Rainbow Day when the big rainbow in Fable Forest sparkles and pops like a giant firework. Everyone is looking forward to it until the colours start fading from the rainbow! Noddy needs to investigate before the rainbow disappears for good! Revs converts into a helicopter so that Noddy and Bumpy can fly over the rainbow to find the pot of rainbow gold. They discover that Cloppycorn has been taking the gold from the pot to give his unicorn horn a special golden glow. He didn't realise that the gold was the source of the rainbow colours. Noddy persuades Cloppycorn to return the gold to the pot and Rainbow Day goes ahead as planned. Everyone enjoys the gorgeous firework display from the rainbow. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep34
programme.desc: The Case Of The Flying Toy - When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. Reunited with her wand, Queen Sparklewings is able to bring down the toys. Another successful case for Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. ‘How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the ‘up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about ‘up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out – if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him – balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Galapagos A Go-Go - When Odlulu uses the Become an Animal Key to transform herself into different animals, she accidentally disrupts the Galapagos Islands animal populations. It's up to Wally, Wenda, Edmund and Hillary to protect the Galapagos from Odlulu's creature chaos.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Now It'S Con - Audrey, Dot, Lotta, Richie, Lucretia and Tiny arrive at Horn-A-Con and decide to divide and conquer, breaking into three groups for maximum adventure.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.desc: Where There'S Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.desc: Chercophonie / Oh, Man, And The Sea - Tip becomes a Boovsland rock icon due to her awful guitar playing; When Donny takes Oh fishing, they battle a giant Sturgeon

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies A Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep4
programme.desc: Handcuffs For A Song/ Wright Bros. - Christine won't release Peabody from handcuffs until he lets her sing; the Wright Brothers must get their plane back from a flock of angry birds

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.desc: Kanjigaargh - Blinky, Toby and Claire make a dangerous trade with the Janus Order while Gunmar sets Jim up in a battle to the death

programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren'T Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Rupert & The Hilarious Hiccups - Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda are playing in the forest when Freddy and Freda spot a colourful box dropped by a travelling salesman. They open it expecting to find sandwiches or even a cake but get more than they expected when hiccups jump out of the box instead. They try to run away from the hiccups but crash into the travelling salesman and his colourful cart and upset a box of yawns and a box of giggling noises too. Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda discover that the noises are very infectious and come up with a plan to help the travelling salesman capture the naughty noises again. Greedy Freddy and Freda still haven't learnt their lesson. They find the remainder of the Elf's lunch and guzzle it all up only to catch the hiccups for real and learn that they need to be less greedy in future.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Rupert And The Snowglobe - When Rupert, Bill and Ping-Pong arrive at the beach one sunny day they are amazed to find a small snowstorm raging over one distinct area. Jack Frost emerges and explains that he has come early this year because he wants to catch some sun. He shows them the snowglobe he uses to control the icy storm. The friends play in the snow unaware that Ming has got hold of the snowglobe and is shaking it up, causing the storm to grow out of control....

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky'S Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep79
programme.desc: Fifi'S Filmshow - Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Shark Strength - When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Bedtime - The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Deer Ball - Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington joga futebol - Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Swinging in the Rainforest! - City-slicker umbrella sellers Molly and Gil set up shop in the Amazon rainforest, but howler monkeys take all their merchandise! With the help of the other guppies, they use their knowledge of the Amazon to track down their umbrellas.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Alison in Wonderland! - Mail Carrier Molly is trying to deliver a Friendship Day card for someone named Alison in a place called Wonderland. But to do so, she'll have to get past the card-stealing Queen of Hearts, who has banned Friendship Day across the land!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515

programme.desc: Wagon Ride - Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.desc: Bloodline - When the boys send Dave's DNA sample to a testing lab the results show he's related to Jack The Ripper!

programme.desc: Spongebob B.C. (Before Comedy) - It is prehistoric Bikini Bottom, and we spend a day in the life of SpongeGar, Patar, and Squog. (Spongebob, Patrick, and Squidward's prehistoric alter-egos.)

programme.desc: The Sweet Spot / A Tale of Two Tables - Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car for a long, family, road trip. // Lincoln tries to prove he's mature enough to have dinner at the adult table, leaving the kiddie table behind him.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Project Loud House / In Tents Debate - Lincoln has to get to school on time but getting his sisters out the door proves to be the biggest obstacle of all. // Lincoln is the deciding vote on going to the beach or the amusement park for their family vacation.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Nosy Pony / Beatrice - When Annie tries to stop Pony from being nosy, she creates a bigger problem that puts him in danger! // When Annie takes pity on a lonely friend and lets her spend the day with Pony, she worries her friend is better at taking care of Pony.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Game Horse / Unicorn - Pony becomes a video game master, but when their friends are in danger Annie and Pony need to use their gaming skills to save them. // When Pony thinks he turned into a unicorn, Annie uses him to raise money to save their sports court from closing.

programme.desc: Pineapple Invasion / Salsa Imbecilicus - When SpongeBob hides the secret formula in his home, it’s up to Gary to protect it from Plankton. // When a freak accident causes everyone in town to become as stupid as Patrick, Sandy must save the day.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep204
programme.desc: Mutiny on the Krusty / The Whole Tooth - When a storm sweeps the Krusty Krab away, its crew and customers will need a crazed Krabs to lead them back home. // Patrick’s last baby tooth needs to come out, but he’s afraid to let it go.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep205
programme.desc: Whirlybrains / MermaidPants - SpongeBob and Patrick get hooked on the latest fad - flying your own brain like a tiny drone! // When SpongeBob & Patrick play Mermaidman and Barnacleboy, it's all fun and games until their sworn enemies arrive!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep206
programme.desc: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow - When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.desc: Shifu's Ex - When Shifu's ex-girlfriend, Mei Ling, visits the Jade Palace, Po decides to try and get them back together, despite the fact Mei Ling is now Shifu's most hated enemy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Shoot the Messenger - Po and Tigress must track down and stop a messenger from delivering a scroll that could thrust China into all-out war!

programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 3: Into the Inferno - Sokka, Toph and Suki begin destroying the airship fleet. Aang duels Ozai, but is soon overwhelmed because of his reluctance to kill him.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Field Tripped - The penguins discover a kid on a field trip to the zoo has seen one of their covert missions.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out it’s to free her brother Francis who happens to be a “mind-jacked” Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep103

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep104

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Green-Eyed Monster / Nobody's Purrfect - Miguel invites Chippy, a cute chipmunk-like creature, to join him and Felicity on their friend-iversary, but Chippy isn't all she seems! // Felicity tries a little too hard to be purr-fect and somehow loses both her powers and her confidence.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Hot Sauce Boss / Ghost Pool - When Chicken Chuck adds his own sauce to Penny’s hot wings, a heated competition erupts between the longtime friends. // The kids go on a quest to find a legendary pool in the forest.

programme.desc: Major Snooch / We're With the Band - Major Snooch comes out of the pack to test Ollie as the Chosen One and evaluate CW as a guardian. // Ollie pulls rocker monsters out of the pack for Battle of The Bands, attracting Andre and Bev

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Excuse Me / Night Morning - Fanboy, Chum Chum and Kyle are late for school, but they manage to get Kyle's Elf to write them an excuse note, and it works. // Fanboy learns that Chum Chum has discovered a new part of the day called Night Morning.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Watch Dog / Dog Dish - Using a time travel watch, Dudley tries to go back to the past to outwit Kitty for the last doughnut left in the T.U.F.F. snack room. // Dudley’s forced to wear an amplified sound neck cone to keep from scratching his butt.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Secret of the Ruby Reef - A musical riddle from the Sirenix book sends the Winx to Melody, but Tritannus throws a monstrous wrench in their plan. The Winx' quest for the two remaining gems continues...

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Gem of Empathy - With Tritannus on their tail, the Winx travel to Zenith to obtain the Gem of Empathy. Musa and Flora stay back to babysit Stella who has turned into a three year old. Time is running out for the Winx to complete their quest.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Mystic Mayhem - The Turtles discover for the first time that they're not the weirdest things in New York.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep237

programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone / The Night Patty - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back. // SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: Bubbletown / Girls' Night Out - SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.desc: Food Con Castaways / Snail Mail - The gang heads to a food convention, but things go awry when they become stranded in the woods. // SpongeBob accidentally fibs to his pen pal, but when his friend comes to visit, he must keep the ruse going!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Instant Gram - Dave gets an 'Instant Gram' account and after several embarrassing posts, Alvin does all he can to stop him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Of Mice and Munks - The Chipettes fall in love with a cute little mouse that's doomed to be fed to a snake as part of a science class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Simon Saves the World - Simon's new invention threatens to destroy the world, creating a time loop and changing gravity inside the house.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Premium Parker / Toast of the Town - Parker makes some bougie new friends while the Middlemost Post is on vacation. // Angus and Parker compete in a toast-making contest hosted by Ms. Pam and The Middlemost Toast.

programme.desc: Grub Snub / She's All Bat - When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Gus's, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control. // Lucy gets jealous of Lola's newfound attention after she joins the Mortician's Club.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Much Ado About Noshing / Broadcast Blues - The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynn's Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Camped! - When Dad discovers that his childhood camp is closing, he decides to take the family for one final visit. // They soon uncover a map that could lead to a treasure big enough to save it and prove the existence of an old camp legend.

programme.desc: Kick Some Bot / Salvador Doggy - Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! // When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep6

programme.desc: An Open Book/So Long Stuff - Hugo is trying to finish his new book, but Fig keeps interrupting him! Can Esme and Roy find a way for them both to have fun?

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep123/Ep124
programme.desc: Stop Thief!/Sylvus Sees Red - The Monchhichi are troubled when a number of objects go missing. An investigation conducted by Willow and Capix leads them to Hanae!

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep123/Ep131
programme.desc: Guitar Heroes/Blitz Be Gone - When the Ranchers need Ogie Tinhorn's help to return a skittish dinosaur to its family, Jon doesn't trust Ogie, then learns that even 'bad' guys have 'good' hearts.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep312/Ep341
programme.desc: Save The Hatchlings In Big Sky Park/Eye Spy In Big Sky Park - Rob and the gang need to help baby sea turtles reach the ocean.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider Ep123/Ep131
programme.desc: Dollhouse Mates/Dr. Lucas Is In The House - Lucas and Findley move into the doll house together.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings Ep1/Ep12/Ep34/Ep46/Ep58/Ep60/Ep70
programme.desc: Polar Bear/Lemming Tonic/Bear Countdown/Voodoo Blanket/The Bear and the Butterfly/Babysitting/Piñata Party - Nutty Hill is suffering a stifling heat wave. Grizzy decides to get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable, but the shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep23/Ep24
programme.desc: A Haunting In Crystal Cove/Dead Justice - Mayor Jones is under attack by a poltergeist in his own home, and the only ones who can help him are the Scooby gang.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep1B/Ep4C/Ep8A/Ep11C/Ep17C/Ep22A/Ep26C
programme.desc: Doggone Hill Hog/Tomcat Jetpack/Way Off Broadway/Prehisterics/Jungle Love/The Declaration of Independunce/Catfish Folly - When bully Spike takes over Tom and Jerry's sledding hill, the two partners team up for a trick that backfires, landing the three at home to recuperate.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep112/Ep142
programme.desc: Hello Down There/A Foggy Fable - In the Plains, Bop and Boo meet little MOLE Marvin, who lives underground. He shows them photos he took below of his favorite things. Now the bunnies want to show him their favorite things!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep41/Ep12
programme.desc: Achoo!/Silence Day - Lewis has been playing water fights with Alice for too long and now he's come down with a bout of blue-bung-itis. It's a kind of cold which, besides causing nasal congestion, also makes one teleport in a very contagious blue cloud!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep212/Ep240
programme.desc: Lickety Split/Snow Worries - Tillie wants to play mail monster and Snugs wants to play ice cream shop, but playing two games at the same time proves harder than it seems.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep119/Ep141
programme.desc: Where Did Willow Go?!/The Petrifix Painting - Instead of going to the Peak of Giddiness, Willow must stay behind and prepare the Elixir in Leafy’s absence. Disappointed, he invents an automated Elixir-making system.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep112/Ep140
programme.desc: Family Comes First/It’S A Dino Egg-Mergency - Pitted against the Tinhorns on Rancheroo Day, Jon learns that his family is more important to him than winning.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep341/Ep312
programme.desc: Eye Spy In Big Sky Park/Save The Hatchlings In Big Sky Park - Rob and Marina explore all the different ways animals in Big Sky Park can see.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider Ep123/Ep131
programme.desc: Dollhouse Mates/Dr. Lucas Is In The House - Lucas and Findley move into the doll house together.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep6B/Ep59B/Ep110B/Ep17A/Ep69B/Ep121B/Ep27A
programme.desc: The Wringer/Game, Set, Wabbit/Pussyfoot Soldier/Carrot Before the Horse/Houston, We Have A Duck Problem/The Bunny and the Goon/Sir Little Chin Griffin Hunter - Yosemite Sam hires a Bugs Bunny impersonator to cause mayhem around town. All goes according to plan...Bugs' plan, that is.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep14/Ep40
programme.desc: To Bowl Or Not To Bowl/Spread Those Wings And Fly - In a bid to defeat his nemesis at the big bowling tournament, Daffy has to swallow his pride and ask Bugs for help.

programme.title: Roger Ep115/Ep116/Ep117/Ep118/Ep126/Ep120/Ep121
programme.desc: The Opera/The Magic Wand/The Visitors/The Cabin/Bedtime/Christmas For Everyone/Leaving One Day…? - Fatou and Roger don’t have the heart to tell Irina that she sings like a rusty windmill. Convinced that she is the world’s next great diva, Irina decides to perform a recital for the entire island. In order to avoid an imminent disaster, Roger and Fatou come up with a plan: Hiding inside Irina’s (big) mouth, they plan on playing opera records that will give the illusion of beautiful singing. Well of course nothing goes according to plan…

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep14
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
